channel.title: I need a code for setting things to spawn- items

item.title: I need a code for setting things to spawn- items
item.dc:creator: @chop chop
item.description:
@chop wrote:

um try thisâ€¦paste it in client.java

if (command.startsWith("item") { try { int newitem = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (newitem >= 0) { ItemHandler.addItem(newitem, absX, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.itemExists(newitem, absX, absY); } else { sendMessage("No Such Item"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Item ID Not Found"); }[br][size=1]Posted on: May 22, 2007, 02:41:25 AM[/size][hr]Just Type

::item 1048

and it will spawn the item associated with the item id i.e 1048 is white phat

Read full topic
